statements: UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET country = 'Germany', carbon_target = 50.75 WHERE policy_id = 1;
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_type = 'Emission Reduction', implementation_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE policy_id = 2;
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET carbon_target = 25.75, policy_type = 'Energy Efficiency' WHERE policy_id = 1;
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET country = 'Germany', implementation_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE policy_name = 'Renewable Energy Promotion';
UPDATE climate_change_policies_table SET policy_name = 'Renewable Energy Incentives' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE climate_regulations_table SET regulator = 'Environmental Protection Agency', effective_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE country = 'Canada';
UPDATE climate_change_policies_table SET end_date='2022-12-31', policy_type='Environmental Regulation' WHERE country='USA' AND policy_name='Clean Air Act';
UPDATE climate_regulations_table SET regulation_name='Carbon Tax Act', regulation_type='Taxation Policy' WHERE country='Canada' AND regulator='Environment and Climate Change Canada';
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_description = 'Updated policy description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ClimateChangeRegulations SET regulation_name = 'Updated regulation name', effective_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_name = 'Renewable Energy Policy', implementation_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE ClimateChangeReports SET report_date = '2023-06-30', report_name = 'Annual Climate Report' WHERE country = 'Canada';
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_name = 'Carbon Tax', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE PolicyOrganizations SET contact_email = 'contact@environment.org', organization_name = 'Green Earth Foundation' WHERE headquarters_location = 'New York';

UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_name = 'Renewable Energy Transition', start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2025-12-31', policy_description = 'A comprehensive plan to shift towards renewable energy sources' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PolicyOrganizations SET headquarters_location = 'New Headquarters, London', contact_email = 'info@neworganization.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET region='Europe' WHERE policy_id=1;
UPDATE ComplianceRecords SET compliance_details='Met all requirements' WHERE record_id=3;
UPDATE ClimateChangePolicies SET policy_name = 'Updated Policy Name', policy_description = 'Updated Policy Description' WHERE policy_id = 1;
UPDATE RegulatoryBodies SET jurisdiction = 'New Jurisdiction' WHERE body_id = 2;
